title: Molestered 820-00239-09
message: hey guys. i got a touch bar in with no j6951. it has been ripped off board. any way to replace these? solder direct to board>? what are my options>?

title: Molestered 820-00239-09
message:
Get one from scrap board.
Put leaded solder on the board pads and preheat the board from bottom side.

title: Molestered 820-00239-09
message: oh. sucks if u dont have a donor board. any chance other connectors could work for this?

title: Molestered 820-00239-09
message:
Compare original connector with other boards.
If nothing in stock, check photos for other MacBooks boards on Internet and order corresponding one.

title: Molestered 820-00239-09
message: i ordered connectors for the time being. In the meantime i plug into charger and 20v with 0a.
